generated_text:
- road: The image shows a wide paved road with white lane markings extending into the distance, typical of a street.
- sidewalk: Pedestrian sidewalks are visible on both sides of the road, with people walking on them.
- building: Several buildings are visible, including a large modern building on the right and a curved building in the background.
- vegetation: Trees are visible along the sides of the road and in the background.
- sky: The sky is visible above the buildings and trees, appearing bright and clear.
- person: Several people are visible walking on the sidewalks.
- car: A dark-colored car is visible parked on the right side of the road.
- bus: A red and white bus is visible in the distance, approaching the intersection.
- traffic light: Traffic lights are visible at the intersection, with one showing green.
- traffic sign: A "50" speed limit sign is visible on the right side of the road.
- pole: Several poles are visible, including those supporting the traffic lights and signs.
